name: usbmon
description: a subsystem of Linux kernel to capture usb packets.

name: USBPcapOdinDumper
description: transforms .pcap files with usbmon and USBPcap frames format of captures from flashing an Android phone with Odin or Heimdall into a set of files with frames payload. Useful for reverse-engineering. Has a modular architecture easily transformable for other applications formats.
